title: Cape Cod Cocktail Meatballs
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can jellied cranberry sauce (such as Ocean Spray®)
method: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Step 2: Mix ground beef, bread crumbs, parsley, eggs, onion, soy sauce, and garlic powder in a bowl until thoroughly combined. Pinch off about 2 teaspoons of meat mixture per meatball and roll into small meatballs. Arrange meatballs in a large, deep baking dish.
Step 3: Bake in the preheated oven until meatballs are browned, about 25 minutes. Drain excess grease.
Step 4: Combine cranberry sauce, ketchup, brown sugar, and lemon juice in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir until cranberry sauce melts and sugar dissolves.
Step 5: Pour sauce over meatballs and bake until sauce forms a glaze and meatballs are no longer pink inside, 25 to 30 minutes more.
